title: Rotarix Oral 1.5ML Susp
details: This vaccine is used to prevent a certain virus infection (rotavirus) in infants and young children. Rotavirus can cause fever, vomiting, and diarrhea.
precautions: Tell your health care professional your child's medical history of, Current fever/illness, Current vomiting/diarrhea, Blockage, Intussusception, Not gaining weight/growing as expected, Hemophilia, HIV infection, SCID, Leukemia/lymphoma, Cancer or radiation treatment.
effects: Mild fever, diarrhea, or vomiting may occur.
